title: Ousting of CEO Sam Altman draws pushback from OpenAI staff
description: Sam Altman, whose departure from OpenAI was announced Friday, joined Microsoft following a weekend of boardroom drama that sent shock waves across Silicon Valley. NBC News' Jake Ward reports on the reaction to Altman's dismissal.

title: US Marshalls served subpoenas to CEOs of X and Discord for child exploitation hearing
description: Dick Durbin (D-IL) and Lindsey Graham (R-SC) called on Big Tech CEOs to "explain their failures" in front of the Senate Judiciary Committee.

title: Consumer Reports’ best products of 2023 are…
description: Consumer Reports digital lifestyle editor Elliot Weiler stops by Studio 1A to share Consumer Reports’ top products from 2023, including a celebrity-endorsed Dutch oven, professional vacuum cleaner, Hamilton Beach coffee maker and more.

title: Sam Altman joins Microsoft to lead new AI project after OpenAI ouster
description: Sam Altman has joined Microsoft to lead a new artificial intelligence project, the tech giant said early Monday, after he was ousted as CEO of OpenAI. CNBC's Arabile Gumede reports for Early Today.
